durango.name: Animas Valley Floor
durango.description: Downtown Durango and the Animas River corridor. Sheltered from wind, prone to cold-air pooling and fog.
durango.terrain_notes: River valley, temperature inversions common in winter

durango.name: La Plata Foothills
durango.description: Western foothills rising toward the La Plata Mountains. Higher precip, more wind exposure.
durango.terrain_notes: Transitional terrain, orographic enhancement on westerly flow

durango.name: Coal Bank / Molas Pass Approach
durango.description: High-elevation passes on US-550. Extreme wind, heavy snow, whiteout risk. Critical travel corridor.
durango.terrain_notes: Alpine passes, exposed ridgeline, frequent blowing snow

durango.name: Hermosa Valley
durango.description: North of town along Hermosa Creek. Slightly higher and cooler than valley floor.
durango.terrain_notes: Narrow valley with cold air drainage

durango.name: South Durango Mesa
durango.description: Mesa country south of town. More wind-exposed, drier microclimate.
durango.terrain_notes: Open mesa, faster snow melt, wind-prone
